Class AbstractRole

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.catalina.users.AbstractRole
All Implemented Interfaces:
Principal, Role
Direct Known Subclasses:
MemoryRole
public abstract class AbstractRole
extends Object
implements Role

Convenience base class for Role implementations.

Since:
4.1
